WYSIWYM.libraries
Class Lexicon

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.libraries.Lexicon

public class Lexicon
extends Object

Lexicon creates Dependency Trees for properties from property-specific input files

Version:
1.00 2006/11/13
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

specExists

public static boolean specExists(String property,
                                 OntologyReader reader)
Checks whether the given property has a specification (or its inverse does, or a superproperty).

Parameters:
property - Property name
reader - Ontology
Returns:
true if there is a specification for this property

map

public DependencyTreeTransformer map(String name)
                              throws IOException
Map an edge in the graph to a dependencytree, by finding the correct lexicon entry and creating the dependencytree contained in it

Parameters:
name - The name of the property
Returns:
DependencyTreeTransformer with the specification
Throws:
IOException - if the file could not be read

Returns an NL representation of the given number (e.g. 'fifty')

Parameters:

Returns:
String containing number in natural language

getRankNL

public static String getRankNL(int nr)
Returns an NL representation of the rank order of the given number (e.g. 'fiftieth')

Parameters:
nr - number
Returns:
String containing rank order number in natural language
